titles.title: Jesus shall reign where’er the sun

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To Him shall endless prayer be made. And princes throng to crown His head, His name like sweet perfume shall rise With every morning sacrifice.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessings abound where’er He reigns: The prisoner leaps to lose his chains, The weary find eternal rest, And all the sons of want are blest.{/lang-eng}

v6
